name: $resourceType
desc: Returns the FHIR type name for this instance

name: $identifier
desc: Returns: Business identifier associated with the detected issue record.

name: $addidentifier
desc: Business identifier associated with the detected issue record.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Business identifier associated with the detected issue record.

name: $status
desc: Returns: Indicates the status of the detected issue.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the status of the detected issue.

name: $code
desc: Returns: Identifies the general type of issue identified.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Identifies the general type of issue identified.

name: $severity
desc: Returns: Indicates the degree of importance associated with the identified issue based on the potential impact on the patient.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the degree of importance associated with the identified issue based on the potential impact on the patient.

name: $patient
desc: Returns: Indicates the patient whose record the detected issue is associated with.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Indicates the patient whose record the detected issue is associated with.

name: $author
desc: Returns: Individual or device responsible for the issue being raised.  For example, a decision support application or a pharmacist conducting a medication review.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Individual or device responsible for the issue being raised.  For example, a decision support application or a pharmacist conducting a medication review.

name: $implicated
desc: Returns: Indicates the resource representing the current activity or proposed activity that is potentially problematic.

name: $addimplicated
desc: Indicates the resource representing the current activity or proposed activity that is potentially problematic.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Indicates the resource representing the current activity or proposed activity that is potentially problematic.

name: $evidence
desc: Returns: Supporting evidence or manifestations that provide the basis for identifying the detected issue such as a GuidanceResponse or MeasureReport.

name: $addevidence
desc: Supporting evidence or manifestations that provide the basis for identifying the detected issue such as a GuidanceResponse or MeasureReport.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Supporting evidence or manifestations that provide the basis for identifying the detected issue such as a GuidanceResponse or MeasureReport.

name: $detail
desc: Returns: A textual explanation of the detected issue.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: A textual explanation of the detected issue.

name: $reference
desc: Returns: The literature, knowledge-base or similar reference that describes the propensity for the detected issue identified.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The literature, knowledge-base or similar reference that describes the propensity for the detected issue identified.

name: $mitigation
desc: Returns: Indicates an action that has been taken or is committed to reduce or eliminate the likelihood of the risk identified by the detected issue from manifesting.  Can also reflect an observation of known mitigating factors that may reduce/eliminate the need for any action.

name: $addmitigation
desc: Indicates an action that has been taken or is committed to reduce or eliminate the likelihood of the risk identified by the detected issue from manifesting.  Can also reflect an observation of known mitigating factors that may reduce/eliminate the need for any action.

lvardefs.name: objRef
